scripts.cover: npm run lint && istanbul cover --report lcov _mocha -- -R spec
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls ; rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.dist: npm run cjs-min; npm run globals-min; npm run amd-min; npm run globals-all
scripts.cjs-min: npm run cjs; uglifyjs dist/obs.js > dist/obs.min.js
scripts.globals-min: npm run globals; uglifyjs dist/obs.globals.js > dist/obs.globals.min.js
scripts.amd-min: npm run amd; uglifyjs dist/obs.amd.js > dist/obs.amd.min.js
scripts.globals-all: npm run globals; npm run deps; cat dist/vendor/sublish.globals.js dist/obs.globals.js | uglifyjs > dist/obs.all.min.js
